title: Red Blooded
description: What’s hotter than a man in uniform? Getting him out of his uniform. Meet the red-blooded, true-blue men of Special Task Force Zeta!  TREY The woman who’s posing as Trey’s wife on a special assignment is exactly the kind of distraction he can’t afford. Carly can’t believe she agreed to a dangerous mission with the one thing she swore never to have in her life again—a military man. It’s not long, though, before her body betrays her, followed closely by her heart.  JACK Jack never wanted a forced vacation back home, but the new farm hand is rousing his interest. She’s hiding something—and he’s got the skills to find out what. The farm is the perfect place for Niccolina to hide…until Jack shows up. He strikes sparks that put both her body and her heart in danger. Especially when her secrets catch up to her.  JIMMY Jimmy had one amazing night with the governor’s hot, redheaded daughter. Then an assignment pulled him away to the worst six months of his life. The only reason he’s alive—her memory. It figures that Lia’s one rebellious night ended when the man disappeared. When they meet again, the chemistry is stronger than ever. Tempting her to stop sacrificing happiness for the family dynasty. Warning: Contains bad men with big…guns, special operatives looking for some action, and sex hot enough to melt your panties off.
author: Cat Johnson
